Description: Clay tablet; formerly complete; lawsuit over a woman's inheritance; Old Babylonian; fragments broken from object.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.296)
Condition: Incomplete; formerly complete; fragments broken from object.
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
